limitation_of_liability.description: Except as expressly stated in this Agreement, Elsevier disclaims all liability to the Customer in connection with the parties' performance of this Agreement and will not be liable for special, indirect, or consequential damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, loss of business, or unfitness for user purposes.
